Search.title: The Small World
Search.description: Please help raise $40,000 to support 40 girls from rural villages of Nepal with housing and education support each year.

Search.title: Origin Learning Fund
Search.description: Please help Origin Learning fundraise $50,000 to empower indigenous and migrant young women through tailored quality digital education in La Guajira, Colombia.

Search.title: Donation For Flood In Pakistan
Search.description: The number of damaged and destroyed houses now exceeds 2 million. Around 23,900 schools, 1,460 health facilities and 13,000 km of roads have also reportedly been damaged.

Search.title: Dhammajarinee Witthaya School
Search.description: Please help us raise $50,000 to purchase 205 laptops for the 410 girls in grades 7-9 to learn STEM and English at the Dhammajarinee Witthaya School.

Search.title: Women's Resource Center
Search.description: Help us educate girls in Siem Reap, Cambodia about their sexual and reproductive rights and empower them to make educated choices!

Search.title: Girl Move
Search.description: Help Girl Move raise $50,000.00 to help girls in Mozambique to recover learning loss due to setbacks from the COVID-19 pandemic.
